danata gammu pemwathungana ada dawasema eyalata upades dila mata athi wela ayi eyala godak dukwidinne pem karanna patan gaththa mul dawase idalama eyalata oni anith kenawa thamange karaganna hada dema thamanta ooni widihata thiyenna ooni ehema kawadawath sidda wenna anikage sathuta saha aashawan wenuwen kapakirim karanna purudu wenna oni samahara pirimi aya hithanawa pem karana kota thamange pemwathiya wena pirimi pudgalayin asuru karanna hoda na kiyala kawadawath ehema wennaapi pemkaranna patan gath paliyata api marila ipadenna ne api apimayi thawa kenekuta anuwa hadagahenna kalaya uwamana karanawa eeka therun ganna minissunta puluwan wenna ooni aadaraya kiyanne balen ganna puluwan deyak neme api aadaraya karanna ooni ethakota aadaraya apitama labenawa anith pudgalayagen pamanak aadaraya balaporoththu wela wadak na kalin apiyi aadaraya karanna ooni labena de gana hithanna epa puluwan tharam anikawa sathuten thiyanna uthsaha karanna ethakota dannathuwama sathuta apiwa hoyagena enawa man eeka pudgalikawama danna deyak man hamoma sathuten thiyanawa mawa therun gaththa man gana danna aya man duken inna dawasata mawa godak sathutu karanawa jiwithe pathum hoyagena yan epa eewa itu weyiapi katawath karadarayak nathuwa eyalawa sathutin thiyanawa nan eeka thamayi jiwithaya kiyanne api aadareyi kiyala nithi danna yanna hoda na nidahase thiyanna anith pudgalayawa.

indiyawa dijital sinama wa samaga athwal banda gaththe 2006 wasare diya.ee malayalam chithrapatayak wana munamathoral samagaya.chithrapata pradarshanaya parani chithrapata rila wenuwata had disk ekka magin ho antharjalaya haraha ba ganimin prekshakayanta wada apuru sinama athdakimak gena eema ehi aramuna wiya.kese wethath sinama dijitalkaranaya lowa balaporoththu wu tharam wegayen sidu wuwak nowiya.yuropaye ho amerikawe ho aasiyawe dijital sinama thakshanaya pathira giya da lathin amerikawa saha aprika ratawal dijital sinamawa walanda ganne hemihitaya.eheth me kawarekuta wuwa da 2015 wana wita ee sandaha anuwarthanaya nowunahoth ema ratawala sinama anagathaya pilibanda barapathala saka sanka athiwima yukith sahagath weyi.sinama pradarshanaye di chithrapata rila bhawithayen thora wima lowa pura sinama nishpadakawarunta dolar biliyana gananaka mudalak ithuru kara dimaki.eheth eyata sarilana lesa sinamahal nawikaranaya kirima tharamak wishala wiyadamaki.
